#### Clear Environment
```{r}
rm(list = ls())
```

#### Load Libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(readxl)
library(stringr)
library(RSQLite)
```

## Load SQLite Database
```{r}
# Create a connection to our new database, CraigslistCars.sqlite3
conn <- dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(), "CraigslistCars.sqlite3")
```

#### list of available tables in the database
```{r}
dbListTables(conn)
```
#### Test Query
```{r}
dbGetQuery(conn, "SELECT * FROM cars LIMIT 10")
```
